mapper.insert: insert into reply_tb(no, inquiry_no, content, writer) values(seq_reply_tb_no.nextval, #{inquiryNo}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select no, inquiry_no as inquiryNo, content, writer, case to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') then to_char(reg_date,'hh24:mi:ss') else to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') end regDate from reply_tb where inquiry_no = #{ inquiryNo } order by no asc
